official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to pay all minimum bill charges determined by the Tennessee Valley Authority under certain contracts for the purchase of electric power by the Department of Energy.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to pay certain minimum bill charges determined by the Tennessee Valley Authority under specified contracts for electric power purchases by the Department of Energy.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to pay all minimum bill charges determined by the Tennessee Valley Authority under certain contracts for the purchase of electric power by the Department of Energy.
